means: 傲慢的家伙，自以为了不起的年轻人，不重要的人

sentence.Network_en: How can I take care of this whippersnapper?
sentence.Network_cn: 我如何对付这个自以为是的年轻人呢?

PerfectNetExp.abs: whipper-in 院内政党干事whippersnapper 傲慢的家伙whippet 小灵狗
snapper 脾气暴躁的人，说话尖刻的人whippersnapper 傲慢的家伙，不重要的人rapper 敲门者，控告者

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: perhaps representing whipsnapper, expressing noise and unimportance

entry.tran: 自以为是的人;妄自尊大的人
entry.def: If you refer to a young person as a whippersnapper, you disapprove of them because you think that they are behaving more confidently than they should.

example.tran: 这群不负责任自以为是的年轻人

means.word_mean: 1. someone who is unimportant but cheeky and presumptuous
